comment.author: 64848937@N00
comment._content: This is a view of the venerable hotel from St. Stephen's Green.  The comparison with the park of today is striking.  Nowadays only the top of the hotel is visible over mature trees.

comment.author: 22071536@N06
comment._content: Can't wait to stay here in a few weeks!
